import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./FeaturedCollectionSection.css" import productImg from "./images/headset.jpg"; export default function FeaturedCollections() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); //init it with empty array useEffect(() => { async function fetchProducts() { try { const response = await fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products?category_not_in=electronics') const data = await response.json(); const filteredData = data.filter((product) => product.category !== 'electronics'); setProducts(filteredData); console.log(filteredData) } catch (error) { console.log("error to fetch the data") } } fetchProducts(); }, []) return (

Featured Collections

{products.map((product) => (
{product.title}
{product.price}
))} {/*

100$

) }
